message.content: We refer to Wikipedia articles on medicine for help. The patient has a history of hypertension and dyslipidemia, which predispose him to strokes. Clopidogrel is an antiplatelet drug used to prevent future strokes. Alteplase and Urokinase are thrombolytic drugs used to dissolve blood clots in patients with acute ischemic stroke. Celecoxib is a nonsteroidal anti-inflammatory drug (NSAID) used to relieve pain and inflammation.

Alteplase and Urokinase are thrombolytic agents used for acute treatment of stroke. Celecoxib is a nonsteroidal anti-inflammatory drug used to relieve pain and inflammation.

We refer to Wikipedia articles on medicine for help. The patient had an ischemic stroke, which is caused by a blockage of blood flow to the brain. Clopidogrel is an antiplatelet agent that can help prevent future ischemic strokes. Alteplase and urokinase are thrombolytic agents used to dissolve clots in the blood vessels, but they are not used for prevention of strokes. Celecoxib is a nonsteroidal anti-inflammatory drug that is used for pain relief and inflammation, but it does not prevent strokes.
